title: Cartoon for Printed Cotton Textile: The French in Egypt  [Les Francais en Egypte]
medium: Pen and gray ink, brush and wash, graphite (?) on white wove paper
description: Drawing includes five scenes: center, French officer being attacked by Arab chieftain; upper left, Arab chieftain witnessing a dance between three women; upper right, a chieftain paying homage to an idol, with other figures; lower left, a chieftain taking leave of his family before a mosque; lower right, battle between a Frenchman and an Arab.
name: Drawing
